      • processStarted

        public void processStarted(Request request)
        Description copied from interface: DataLoader.LoadingListener
        Called before the loading process started. Process can be divided into uploading and downloading (HTTP POST and GET), or just downloading (other protocols).
        Specified by:
        processStarted in interface DataLoader.LoadingListener<T>
        Parameters:
        request - Request that is processed now

      • uploadingUpdateProgress

        public void uploadingUpdateProgress(Request request,
                           long uploadedBytes,
                           long totalBytes)
        Description copied from interface: DataLoader.LoadingListener
        Called while the params are uploaded.
        Specified by:
        uploadingUpdateProgress in interface DataLoader.LoadingListener<T>
        Parameters:
        request - Request that is processed now
        uploadedBytes - total bytes that have already been uploaded
        totalBytes - total bytes that should be uploaded (sum of all params sizes)

      • downloadingUpdateProgress

        public void downloadingUpdateProgress(Request request,
                             long loadedBytes,
                             long totalBytes)
        Description copied from interface: DataLoader.LoadingListener
        Called while the data is downloaded.
        Specified by:
        downloadingUpdateProgress in interface DataLoader.LoadingListener<T>
        Parameters:
        request - Request that is processed now
        loadedBytes - total bytes that have already been downloaded
        totalBytes - total bytes that should be downloaded (content length)

      • processFinished

        public void processFinished(Request request,
                   byte[] rawData,
                   T data)
        Description copied from interface: DataLoader.LoadingListener
        Called when the loading had been successfully finished.
        Specified by:
        processFinished in interface DataLoader.LoadingListener<T>
        Parameters:
        request - Request that had just successfully finished
        rawData - raw downloaded data
        data - postprocessed loader-specific data

        Description copied from interface: DataLoader.LoadingListener
